data.meta_description: Prints of Portrait of Ugo Foscolo (1778-1827), 1801-1802. Found in the Collection of Pinacoteca di Brera, Milan
data.text:
Heritage Images Photo Prints and Wall Art

Portrait of Ugo Foscolo (1778-1827), 1801-1802. Creator: Appiani, Andrea (1754-1817)

Portrait of Ugo Foscolo (1778-1827), 1801-1802. Found in the Collection of Pinacoteca di Brera, Milan. Heritage Images features heritage image collections. Â© Fine Art Images/Heritage Images

Media ID 19063157

Andrea 1754 1817 Appiani Milan Pinacoteca Di Brera

Framed Prints

Bring the timeless elegance of history into your home with our exquisite Framed Print from Media Storehouse. This captivating portrait, featuring Ugo Foscolo (1778-1827) as depicted by Andrea Appiani in 1801-1802, is a stunning addition to any decor. Sourced from the esteemed collection of Pinacoteca di Brera in Milan, this heritage-quality print showcases the intricate details and rich colors of the original artwork. Each frame is meticulously crafted to enhance the beauty of the print, providing a museum-quality presentation. Elevate your space with a piece of history that tells a story and inspires conversation. Order your Framed Print of Portrait of Ugo Foscolo today and embrace the art of the past, in the present.

Photo Prints

Introduce a touch of history into your home or office with this exquisite Portrait of Ugo Foscolo, a masterpiece by Andrea Appiani from the esteemed collection of Pinacoteca di Brera in Milan. Captured in 1801-1802, this portrait showcases the Italian poet, journalist, and patriot in his prime. Appiani's skillful brushstrokes bring out the depth and character of Foscolo's eyes, inviting you to explore the rich history and legacy of this influential figure. Our Media Storehouse Photographic Prints are known for their exceptional quality and vibrant colors, ensuring that this timeless piece of art will be a cherished addition to any space.

Poster Prints

Introduce the enigmatic figure of Ugo Foscolo to your space with our exquisite poster print from Media Storehouse. This captivating portrait, created by Andrea Appiani in 1801-1802, showcases the Italian poet, patriot, and revolutionary in his prime. With intricate details and vivid colors, this print brings the masterpiece from the Pinacoteca di Brera in Milan into your home or office. Embrace the rich history and culture of the past, and add a touch of sophistication to your surroundings with our high-quality poster print of Ugo Foscolo by Andrea Appiani.

Jigsaw Puzzles

Discover the captivating world of history and art with our exquisite jigsaw puzzle from Media Storehouse. This intriguing puzzle features a stunning portrait of Ugo Foscolo, an influential Italian poet and patriot, painted by Andrea Appiani in 1801-1802. Captured in the Collection of Pinacoteca di Brera in Milan, this portrait showcases Foscolo's intense gaze and elegant attire, transporting you back in time. Bring this masterpiece into your home and enjoy the therapeutic process of piecing together this beautiful work of art, one puzzle piece at a time. Experience the joy of history and art with Media Storehouse's jigsaw puzzles.
